body: Zimbabwean, Facebook and the changing meaning of "friend" and "community":"...in my adult life I get perplexed when I receive an e-mail from someone I barely know asking me to be their friend. The word friend seems to have mutated to the point where I am lost.

title: Zimbabwe: Zimbabwean, Facebook and new meaning of "friend"

sentence: Zimbabwean, Facebook and the changing meaning of "friend" and "community":"...in my adult life I get perplexed when I receive an e-mail from someone I barely know asking me to be their friend.
The word friend seems to have mutated to the point where I am lost.
